打开debug_ms=2，以获得osd_op/osd_op_reply日志：

## 跨机房时间正常示例

```shell
2021-06-30 16:45:54.632467 7f5c05640700  1 [tx0000000000000000002cb-0060dc2f42-adf48-default] -- 172.17.193.71:0/197010059 --> 172.17.65.99:6835/69117 -- osd_op(unknown.0.0:87530 5.61c 5:3862df4a:::.dir.6eddafad-0b63-42a8-90d9-93c17425ffbb.29014.17.26:head [call rgw.bucket_list] snapc 0=[] ondisk+read+known_if_redirected e46280) v8 -- 0x562f9c2b1600 con 0

2021-06-30 16:45:54.689088 7f5d3b0ab700  1 [] -- 172.17.193.71:0/197010059 <== osd.58 172.17.65.99:6835/69117 1832 ==== osd_op_reply(87530 .dir.6eddafad-0b63-42a8-90d9-93c17425ffbb.29014.17.26 [call] v0'0 uv34549 ondisk = 0) v8 ==== 197+0+231186 (2470527675 0 3366346865) 0x562f9da98840 con 0x562f99eeb800
```



## 同机房示例

```shell
同机房示例

2021-06-30 16:45:54.812401 7f5d3b0ab700  1 [] -- 172.17.193.71:0/197010059 <== osd.35 172.17.193.77:6808/73111 577 ==== osd_op_reply(87619 .dir.6eddafad-0b63-42a8-90d9-93c17425ffbb.29014.17.115 [call] v0'0 uv49130 ondisk = 0) v8 ==== 198+0+235086 (1794760116 0 3819891387) 0x562f9da98840 con 0x562f99e7a000
```
